The ninth session of the ABC (Accessible Bioinformatics Cafe) will be **on november 28th, at 13:00-15:00 in building 1873-118A**

![Map to find the room](../../img/news/1873-118A-loc.png){width=400px}
![Building 1873 on AU-city](../../img/news/1873-118A-find.png.png){width=400px}

Everyone is welcome to **join independently of coding skills and level**. 

## Agenda
 
For this ABC we show how to use graphical applications on GenomeDK, and specifically show Rstudio and Jupyterlab.
 
## Signing up

Please sign up to ensure there is enough cake (and you are pretty sure you will show up): click on the button below to give us a heads up of your presence. Don't do it multiple times to cheat for extra cake!
